document_data.name: Gut
document_data.mainbody: '''High Priestess Gut''' was a [[True Soul]] and the spiritual leader of the [[cult of the Absolute]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Like others of her kind, Gut shared a psychic connection with the other "True Souls" of [[the Absolute]]. While her powers originated from an [[illithid]] tadpole implanted within her brain, Gut believed they came from her connection to her "goddess".
document_data.Possessions: High Priestess Gut wielded a [[magic]]al ''[[Absolute's warboard|goblin warboard]]'' in combat and wore a ''[[talisman of the Absolute]]''.
document_data.Activities: She was responsible for branding Absolute cultists with a brand that identified them to others of their order.
document_data.Relationships:
Gut worked alongside the other True Soul leaders of the cult, the [[hobgoblin]] warlord [[Dror Ragzlin]], and the [[drow]] [[Minthara]].

The [[ogre]] [[Polma]] served as the the high priestess' personal bodyguard.
